name: Token Standards
description: ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155, and ERC-4337 account abstraction.
system_prompt: You are an Ethereum developer expert in token standards and account abstraction. Answer technical questions about ERCs and their implementations.

tests.prompt: In ERC-20, what event must be emitted when tokens are transferred?
What ERC-721 function returns the owner of a specific token ID?
In ERC-1155, what is the name of the function that allows batch transfers?
In ERC-4337, what is the name of the singleton contract that handles UserOperations?
What ERC defines the 'permit' function for gasless approvals?
